lowa ratawal rasak pura pathira gos athi korona wasangathaya hethuwen miya giya sankhyawa 244,760k dakwa ihala gos thibenawa.34 laksha 83,186kata wairasaya aasadanaya wi athi athara in suwaya labu sankhyawa 1,108,411k.amarikawa thula eeye dinaye pamanak marana 1,691k wartha wi athi athara, ee anuwa eratin methek wartha wu mulu marana 67,444k.emenma, 1,160,774k me wana wita wairasaya aasadanaya wi thibenawa.pranshaye dinak thula marana 166k wartha wana athara, eratin wartha wana mulu marana sankhyawa 24,760k.aasadithayin 168,396k dakwa ihala gos athi bawayi wides wartha sandahan kale.spanynyaye dinak thula marana 276k wartha wana athara ee anuwa ehi samastha marana sankhyawa 25,100k.eklaksha 245,567k aasadithayin eratin wartha wanawa.gatha wu paya 24 thula pamanak ithaliye marana 474k wartha wana athara ee anuwa eratin wartha wana mulu marana sankhyawa 28,710 k.aasadithayin sankhyawa 209,328k dakwa ihala gos thibenawa.indiyawe gatha wu paya 24 thula korona marana 100k wana athara eratin wartha wana mulu aasadithayan sankhyawa 39,699k.pilipinayen wartha wana korona marana sankhyawa 603 dakwa ihala gos thibenawa.wides madhya wartha kale ada dinayedi eratin korona aasadithayin 156 deneku saha marana 24k wartha wi athi bawayi.pilipinaye samastha korona aasadithayin sankhyawa 8928k wana athara, sampurnayen suwaya labu sankhyawa 1124k.me athara, singappuruwen da ada dinayedi nawa korona aasadithayin 447 deneku hamuwimath samaga erata samastha aasadithayin sankhyawa 17,548 dakwa ihala gos thibenawa.
